content.description: This route is directly under the steel cable that spans the canyon.  It shares anchors with the route directly to its right, Hot Wire.
content.protection: Around 7 bolts. Two bolt anchor with chains.

content.description: The bottom of this climb is a little crumbly, but the rock quality greatly improves after bolt 1 or 2.  Start up the hollow flake and continue up the ramp to the left.  Follow the bolts to a separate two bolt anchor.  Belay out of the way from the flake.
content.protection: 6 bolts and a two bolt anchor with chains.

content.description: The first route on the way to the main Wire Wall area.  In the drainage after the sandy overhang, follow steep pockets up the bolt line.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws, expect a two bolt traditional anchor with chains or rap rings.
content.location: See topo picture for approximate location. From the ladder, this is the first route that appears on your left after walking down a sandy ramp to a pour off scoop of rock.

content.description: Belay from the platform.  Line of bolts that goes just to the right of the ice cream scoop midway up the wall.  Shares an anchor with High Wire to its' left.
content.protection: 6 bolts, shares a two bolt anchor with chains with High Wire to its' left.

content.description: Shares start with Flotsam, both of which are unclimbed in over a decade.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws.  Expect bolted trad anchors with chains or rap rings.
content.location: Left most pair of routes on Wire Wall that share first few opening bolts.

content.description: Separate line of bolts really close to, but right of Under Wire up to a shared anchor with Under Wire.
content.protection: Around 7 bolts. Two bolt anchor with chains.

content.description: As of Feb 2021 this route is severely overgrown and needs to be restored.  Bring a nut tool some brushes with you!
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws.  Expect a bolted traditional anchor with chains or rap rings.

content.description: Left most climb on Wire Wall.  Unclimbed in likely over a decade and not verified.
content.location: Left most route on Wire Wall

content.description: Right most route on belay platform.  Boulder problem of fun moves in the lower half of the climb.
content.protection: 9 bolts and two bolt anchor with chains.

content.description: Belay from the pedastool and climb the left most route on the platform.  Bolt line stays left of the ice cream scoop halfway up the wall and shares anchors with Live Wire.
content.protection: 7 bolts and shared two bolt anchor with Live Wire.
content.location: Walk around the right of the platform and take a couple of exposed steps up to the easy scramble to the belay platform.  It's the left most route on the platform.

content.description: Wire Wall is the first wall after the one off route The Pour Off.  There is a huge steel cable that spans the canyon above this wall.
